title: Safe and efficient eco-driving using connected and automated vehicles
text:
This is the website for the Discovery project “Safe and efficient eco-driving using connected and automated vehicles” sponsored by the Australian Research Council.



Paradox of liveability and mobility

title: About
text:
This is the website for the Discovery project “Safe and efficient eco-driving using connected and automated vehicles” sponsored by the Australian Research Council.
Some basic information about this project:

title: Team
text:
The project team includes:

Chief Investigators



Professor Zuduo Zheng, School of Civil Engineering, the University of Queensland



Associate Professor Jiwon Kim, School of Civil Engineering, the University of Queensland;



Professor Michiel Bliemer, The University of Sydney Business School



Professor Lidia Morawska, School of Earth & Atmospheric Sciences, Queensland University of Technology




Partner Investigator



Samuel Reynolds Pritchard Professor Hesham Rakha, Department of Civil and Environmental Engineering, VirginidVirginia Polytechnic Institute and State University



Gilbert W. Winslow Career Development Assistant Professor Cathy Wu, LIDS, CEE, IDSS, Massachusetts Institute of Technology
